anya-e1206n0:17_2: māno vividharatanākaropalakkhamānamahagghamaṇi bhedo maṇi bhedo nāma janapado.
anya-e1206n0:38_0: 9. Tassa mahiyaṅgaṇa mahā vihārassa pariyantagāmake selābhayo nāma khattiyo paṭivasanto
anya-e1206n0:38_1: puttaṃ paṭilabhitvā aṅgalakkhaṇapāṭhakānaṃ dassesi te tassa kumārassa aṅgalakkhaṇāni
anya-e1206n0:38_2: oloketvā “ayaṃ kumāro khamakasatto nahoti. Dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampanno, sakalampi
anya-e1206n0:38_3: sīhaḷadīpaṃ ekacchattaṃ karitvā mahantamahantāni acchariyabbhutāni mahāvīracaritāni
anya-e1206n0:39_0: 10. Tato selābhaya khattiyo puttassa abhisekādisampattiṃ sutvā koṭippattapamodaparavasopi
anya-e1206n0:39_1: tasmiṃ kāle anurādhapure rajjaṃ kārayatā “vohāratissamahārājato kadāci keci upaddavo
anya-e1206n0:39_2: jāyissatīti. Jātaparisaṅkotaṃ kumāramādāya mahiyaṅgaṇamahāvihāre bodhi aṅgaṇe parittagge
anya-e1206n0:39_4: “eso me bhante kumāro mahāsaṅghassa ca mahā bodhipādassa ca saraṇaṃ gacchati taṃ
anya-e1206n0:39_5: sabbepi bhadantā rakkhantu saṅghabodhi nāmako cāyaṃ hotu”ti mahāsaṅghassa ca bodhi
anya-e1206n0:39_6: devatāya ca niyyādetvā paṭijagganto kumārassa sattavassika kāle kālamakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:40_0: 11. Atha mātulo naṇdamahāthero kumārakaṃ vihāramānetvā paṭijagganto tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
anya-e1206n0:40_1: uggaṇhāpetvā bāhirasatthesu ca paramakocidaṃ kāresi. Saṅghabodhikumāropi katādhikārattā
anya-e1206n0:40_2: tikkhapaññattā ca ñāṇaviññāṇasampanno hutvā vayappatto lokassa locanehinipiyamānāya
anya-e1206n0:40_3: rūpasampattiyā savañjalipuṭehi assādiyamānasadācāraguṇa sampattiyā ca pattha ṭa yasoghoso ahosi.
anya-e1206n0:41_0: 12. Kimiha bahunā?- Kādambinī kadambato siniddhanīlāyataguṇaṃdhammillakalāpe, paripuṇṇahariṇaṅkamaṇḍalato
anya-e1206n0:41_2: gīvāvayave, kalyāṇasiluccayato saṃhata vilāsaṃ uratthale, surasādhisākhato pīvarāyatalalitarūpaṃ
anya-e1206n0:41_3: kāmadānapadānadva bāhuyugaḷe, samadagaṇdhasindhurato gamanalīḷhaṃ karākāradva hatthiyugaḷe,
anya-e1206n0:41_5: sīnakamalā kamalato rattakomaḷadalasiraṃ caraṇayugaḷe ādāya yojayatā pāramitādhammasippitā
anya-e1206n0:53_0: 15. Athekadā mātulamahātherā vayappattaṃ sirisaṅghabodhi kumāraṃ dhammasavanāvasāne
anya-e1206n0:53_1: āmantetvā evamāha, “kumāra! Mahābhāgadheyya! Idāni tvamasi adhītasugatāgamo, viditasakala
anya-e1206n0:53_2: bāhirasattho. Catubbidhapaṇḍiccakoṭippatto, tathāpi abhimānadhane khattiyakule jāti,
anya-e1206n0:53_3: sabbapatthavyāpitā yobbanavilāsena samalaṅkataṃ sarīraṃ, appaṭimā rūpasiri, amānusaṃ
anya-e1206n0:53_4: balañceti mahatīya balavanaṇtha paramparā’sabbāavinayāna mekekampi tesamāyatanaṃ
anya-e1206n0:53_5: kimuta samavāyo?“Yebhuyyena satthasalila vikkhālanāti nimmalāpi kālusiyamupayāni
anya-e1206n0:53_6: buddhī, anujjhitadhavalatāpi sarāgāeva bhavati navayobbanagabbitānaṃ diṭṭhi, apaharati
anya-e1206n0:53_7: ca vātamaṇḍali keva sukkhapaṇṇaṃ ubabhutarajo bhanti atidūramattano icchāya yobbanasamaye
anya-e1206n0:53_8: purisaṃ pakati. Iṇdriyabhariṇabhārinī sattamatidurantāya mupabhogamigataṇahikā tasmā
anya-e1206n0:53_9: ayamevānassādita visaya rasassa te kālo gurupadesassa. Madanasarappabhārajajjarite
anya-e1206n0:53_10: hadaye jalamiva galati gurūnamanussānaṃ akāraṇaṃchavati duppakati no kulaṃvā sutaṃ
anya-e1206n0:53_11: vā manayassa vaṇdanappabhavonadahati kiṃ dahano? Kiṃvāpasamahetunāpi nātivaṇḍataro
anya-e1206n0:53_12: bhavati vaḍabānaḷo salilena, tasmā gāḷhatara manusāsītabbosi.
anya-e1206n0:54_0: 16. Apagatamale hi manasi elikamaṇimhi viya rajanikaramayukhāpavisanti, sukhamupadesaguṇā,
anya-e1206n0:54_1: guruvacanamamalampi salilamiva mahantaṃ jānimupajanayati savanahataṃ sūlamiva abhabbassa,
anya-e1206n0:54_3: taṇhākasāyitiṇdriyānucarañhi cittaṃ nāvahati kannāmānatthaṃ, tasmā rāja kumārānañca
anya-e1206n0:54_5: iṇdriyavijayo ca sambhavati guruvuddhopasevāya tabbavanamavirādhetvā paṭipajjato,
anya-e1206n0:54_6: tasmā tayā āpāṇapariyantaṃ vatthuttayasaraṇaparāyaṇatā na pahātabbā.
anya-e1206n0:55_0: Na rāgāpasmāravibodhanaṃ visayadahanasalila saṃsevanaṃ kātabbaṃ, passatū hi kalyāṇābhinivesi
anya-e1206n0:55_1: cakkhūṇdriyalāḷana paravasassa salabhassa samujjalita dīpasikhāpatanaṃ sotiṇdriya
anya-e1206n0:55_2: sukhānuyuttassa taruṇa harīṇassa usu pātasammukhībhavanaṃ ghāṇiṇdriya paravasassa
anya-e1206n0:55_5: imehi iṇdriyehi militehi ekassa kāmino sadideva pañcannaṃ, visayarasānamupasevāya
anya-e1206n0:55_6: pattabbaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhajālaṃ kathamupavaṇṇayāma? Imāni ca subhāsitāni paccavekkhatu
anya-e1206n0:62: Ko seveyya paraṃ poso avamānaṃ saheyyavava,
anya-e1206n0:80: 23. Api ca hadayatarukoṭara kuṭīro kodha kuṇḍalīna kadāci bahi kātabbo. Api tu’titikkhāmantena acipphaṇdantaṃ upanetabbo.
anya-e1206n0:103: Sukhañca na vinā dhammaṃ tasmā dhammaparo bhavā’ti.
anya-e1206n0:104_0: 29. Evamādikaṃ sappurisanītipathaṃ ādisante mahāthere tena kalyāṇadhammena asotabbatānādariyaracitabhukūṭika
anya-e1206n0:104_1: mukhena vā disācikkhittacakkhunā ca ahaṅkāraparavasena gajanimilitamubbhāvayatā vā
anya-e1206n0:104_3: tappoṇena sirasā ca pīti samudita sādhuvādavikasitakapolenamukhena ca. Sakalāvayavacitthaṭaromañca
anya-e1206n0:104_4: kañcukitena dehena ca bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā dīghappamāṇa pamāṇa māvarattāmaggaphalalābhatoviya
anya-e1206n0:106: 30. Tato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttapaṭipadaṃ avirādhetvā samāvaraṇena santuṭṭho tassa saṅghabodhi samaññaṃ gopetukāmo mātulamahāthero dhammikoti vohāraṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1206n0:107_0: 31. Lakkhaṇapāṭhakānaṃ vacanaṃ saddahanto bhāgineyyaṃ pabbajitukāmampi apabbājetvā
anya-e1206n0:107_1: “idha vāsato anurādhapure vāsoyeva kumārassa yogakkhemāvaho, puññānurūpena jāyamānassa
anya-e1206n0:107_2: vipākassa ca ṭhānaṃ hoti, mahācetiyassa vattapaṭivattasamācaraṇenaca mahanto puññakkhaṇdho
anya-e1206n0:107_3: sampajissati”ti maññamāno taṃ kumāramādāya gacchanto anurādhapuraṃ gantukāmo nikkhami.
anya-e1206n0:107_4: Saṅghatissogoṭhābhayoti ca lambakaṇṇā rāja kumārā aparepi duce tassa paṃsukīḷanato
anya-e1206n0:107_5: paṭṭhāya sahāyātena kumārena saddhiṃ nikkhamiṃsu te tayo kumāre ādāya gacchanto mahāthero
anya-e1206n0:107_6: puretarameva anurādhapuraṃ pāvisi. Mahātheramanugacchantesu tesu kumāresu jeṭṭho
anya-e1206n0:107_7: saṅghatisso majjhimo saṅghabodhi kaniṭṭho goṭhābhayoti te theraṃ pacchato anugacchantā
anya-e1206n0:107_8: tayopi paṭipāṭi yā tissavāpiyā setumatthakena gacchanti.
anya-e1206n0:108_0: 32. Tattha setusālāya nisinno koci aṇdhovicakkhaṇo tesaṃ tiṇṇantaṃ kumārānaṃ padaviññāsaddaṃ
anya-e1206n0:108_1: sutvā lakkhaṇānusārena upaparikkhipitvā “ete tayopi sīhaḷadīpe pathavissarā bhavissantī”ti
anya-e1206n0:108_2: tattha nisinnānaṃ vyākāsi. Taṃvacanaṃ pacchā gacchanto goṭhābhayo sutvā itaresaṃ
anya-e1206n0:108_3: gacchantānaṃ anivedayitvā paccāgamma “katamo ciraṃ rajjaṃ kāressati? Caṃsaṭṭhitiñca
anya-e1206n0:108_4: karoti”ti? Pucchitvā pacchimoti vutte haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo sīghataraṃ āgamma
anya-e1206n0:108_5: tehi saddhiṃ gacchanto tikhiṇa mantitāya gambhīrabhāvato ca kañci ajānāpetvā antopuraṃ
anya-e1206n0:108_6: pāvisi. Te tayopi patirūpe nivāse vāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:109_0: 33. Atha kaniṭṭho “ete dvepi appāyukattā rajje patiṭṭhitāpi na ciraṃ jīvanti kira
anya-e1206n0:109_1: ahameva tesaṃ rajjaṃ dupessāmi”ti tadanurūpena upāyenapaṭijjanto tesaṃ rajjalābhāya
anya-e1206n0:109_2: upāyaṃ dassento abhiṇhaṃ matteti. Jeṭṭhopi tasmiṃ atipiyāsamāno tenopadiṭṭhameva
anya-e1206n0:109_3: samācarantorājānaṃ disvā laddha sammāno sabbesu rājakiccesu pubbaṅgamo hutvā na cirasseva
anya-e1206n0:109_4: rājavallabho ahosi? Tasmiṃ kāle rajjaṃ kārento vijaya rājā nāma khattiyo tasmiṃ pasanno
anya-e1206n0:109_5: sabbesu rājakiccesu tamameva padhānabhūtaṃ katvā senāpatiṃ akāsi.
anya-e1206n0:110_0: 34. Dhammiko pana rajjena anatthikatāya rajjalābhāya cittampi anuppādetvā kevalaṃ
anya-e1206n0:110_2: pavisitvā tato tehi saddhiṃ nikkhamma sāyaṃ mahā therassa vihāreyeva vasanto attano
anya-e1206n0:110_3: dhammikānuṭṭhānaṃ ahāpetvā mahācetiyo paṭṭhānagilānupaṭṭhānādikaṃ anavajja dhammaṃcaranto kālaṃ vītināmeti.
anya-e1206n0:111: Tadā saṅghatisso sakalarajjañca purañca attanohatthagataṃ katvā ekasmiṃ dine laddhokāso rājānaṃ antobhavaneyeva goṭhābhayena mārāpetvā sayaṃ rajje patiṭṭhati.
anya-e1206n0:113_0: 35. Atha goṭhābhayo dhammikaṃ anicchāmānampi senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā āyatiṃ apekkhamāno
anya-e1206n0:113_1: sayaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko ahosi. Atha saṅghatisso rājā bahuṃ puññca apuññca pasavanto jambuphalapākakāle
anya-e1206n0:113_2: saseno sāmacco sabhorodho abhiṇhaṃ pācīna desaṃ gantvā jambuphalāni khādati. Rañño
anya-e1206n0:113_3: yebhuyyena gamanā gamanena upaddutā raṭṭhavāsino rājupabhogārahesu jambuphalesu visaṃ
anya-e1206n0:113_4: yojesuṃ. Atha so saṅghatisso rājā tena visena tattheva kālamakāsi.
anya-e1206n0:114_0: 36. Atha goṭhābhayo aṇdhavicakkhaṇassa vacanaṃ anussaranto anukkamena rajjaṃ dāpetvā
anya-e1206n0:114_1: pacchā ahaṃ suppatiṭṭho bhavissāmi’ti maññamāno sāmacco saseno saṅghabodhikumāraṃ
anya-e1206n0:114_2: rajjena nimantesi. So temiya mahābodhisattena diṭṭhādīnavattā rajjasukhāpariccāgānubhūtaṃ
anya-e1206n0:114_3: mahantaṃ dukkhajālaṃ anussaritvā punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi paṭikkhipiyeva abhayo gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
anya-e1206n0:114_4: sabbepi manusse sannipātetvā tehi saddhiṃ nānāppakāraṃ yācamānopi sampaṭicchāpetuṃ
anya-e1206n0:114_5: nāsakkhi. Atha sabbepi raṭṭhavāsino sāmaccāmahāvihāraṃ gantvā mahā saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā
anya-e1206n0:114_6: saṅgha majjhe saṅghabodhikumāro mahā saṅghaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajja namassitvā laddhokāso
anya-e1206n0:115_0: 37. Ayañhi rājalakkhīnāma yathā yathā dippate, tathā tathā kappuradīpasikheva kajjilaṃmalinameva
anya-e1206n0:115_1: kammajātaṃ kevalamubbamati. Tathāhi ayaṃ saṃvadhanavāridhārā taṇhāvisavallīnaṃ, nenāda
anya-e1206n0:115_2: madhurabhītikā ayaṃ iṇdriyamigānaṃ, parāmāsadhumalekhā sucarita cittakammassa vibbhamaseyyā
anya-e1206n0:115_3: mohaniddānaṃ timiruggati paññādiṭṭhīnaṃ, purassarapatākā avinayamahāsenāya, uppattininnanā
anya-e1206n0:115_4: kodhavega kumbhilānaṃ, āpānabhūmi micchādiṭṭhivadanaṃ. Saṃgīti sālā issariya vikāranāṭakānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:115_6: haṃsānaṃ, patthāvanā kapaṭanāṭakānaṃ, kadalikā kāmakarino vajjhavālā sādhubhāvassa,
anya-e1206n0:115_7: rāhumukhaṃ dhammacaṇda maṇḍalassa, nahi taṃ passāmi yohi aparicitāyāpi etāya nibbharamupagulho
anya-e1206n0:115_8: na vippaladdho, apica, abhisekasamaye rājaññānaṃ maṅgalakalasajalehi viya vikkhālanamupayāti
anya-e1206n0:115_9: dakkhiññaṃ aggihutatadhumeneva malinībhavati hadayaṃ purohita kusagga samajjatena
anya-e1206n0:115_10: viya apaniyate titikkhā, uṇhīsa paṭṭa baṇdhanena viya chādīyatī jarāgamadassanaṃ,
anya-e1206n0:115_11: ātapatta maṇḍalena viya tirokarīyati paralokāpekkhaṇaṃ, cāmarapavanena viya duramuddhuyate
anya-e1206n0:115_12: saccāditā vettalatāppahārena viya duramapayanti sagguṇā eke rajjasiri madirā madamattā
anya-e1206n0:115_14: paradārābhigamanaṃ viddhatāti, mīgavana parissamoti, surāpānaṃ vilāsoti, niccappamattatā,
anya-e1206n0:115_16: ajitahaccataṃ sukhopasevattamīti, naccagīta gaṇākānusatti rasikatehi paribhavasahattaṃ
anya-e1206n0:115_17: khameti, serībhāvaṃ paṇḍiccāmiti vaṇdijana navacanaṃ yaseṃghosoti taralatā ussāhoti.
anya-e1206n0:115_18: Avisesaññuttaṃ apakkhapātittamiti? Eva dosagaṇampi guṇapakkhe ajjhāropayantehi sayampi
anya-e1206n0:115_19: anto ha santehi patāraṇakusalehi dhuttehi amānusocitāhi thomānāhi patāriyamānā, cittamadamatta
anya-e1206n0:115_20: cittā nicceta na tāya tatheti attani ajjhāropayantā alikābhimānaṃ maccadhammasamānāpi
anya-e1206n0:115_21: dibbaṃ sāvatiṇṇamiva amānusamiva attāna maññamānā āradhadibbocitakirayānu bhāvā sabbajano
anya-e1206n0:115_22: pabhasanīya bhāvamupayanti. Atta milambanañca anu jīvijanena karīyamānaṃ abhinaṇdanti.
anya-e1206n0:116_0: 38. Mānasā devatājjhāropaṇappatāraṇa sambhūta sambhāvano pahatañca anto paviṭṭha
anya-e1206n0:116_1: aparabhujayugaṃ viya attano bāhuyugaṃ sambhāvayanti. Tacantarita locanaṃsakalalāṭa
anya-e1206n0:116_2: māsaṃkanti, alikasambhāvanābhimānabharitā na namassanti devatāyo na pūjayanti samaṇa
anya-e1206n0:116_3: brāhmaṇe na mānayantī mānanīye, na upatiṭṭhanti gurudassanepi anatthakāyā sāntarīta,
anya-e1206n0:116_4: visayo pabhogasukhāti apahasanti yatino? Jarābhi bhavapalapimiti na suṇanti vuddhajanupadesaṃ,
anya-e1206n0:116_5: attano paññā paribhavoti ususanti sacivo pahesassa,kuñjanti ekanta hitavādinaṃ evamādinā
anya-e1206n0:116_6: kākaṇena bahunnaṃ dosānaṃ mākara bhūtaṃrajjīvibhavaṃ ayaṃ na icchāmī’ti avoca.
anya-e1206n0:117_0: 39. Atha mahājanena sādara majjhesito mahāsaṅgho kumārabhimukho hutvā “mahābhāgadheyya!
anya-e1206n0:117_1: Thanacucuke laggitājaluka tikkhaḍasanenatattha vedanuppādayanti lohitameva ākaḍḍhati,
anya-e1206n0:117_2: dārako pana komalena mukhapuṭenamātu sukhasaññaṃ uppādayanto khīrameva avheti.
anya-e1206n0:118_0: 40. Evameva rajjavibhavaṃ patto adhīro bālo bahuṃ apuññameva sañciṇāni, medhāvi dhirapuriso
anya-e1206n0:118_1: pana āyusaṅkhārassa dubbalattañca dhanasañcayassa nissārattañca paññāya upa parikkhitvā
anya-e1206n0:118_2: dasa kusalakammāni pūrento tādisena mahatā bhogakkhaṇdhena mahantaṃ kusalarāsiṃ upaciṇāti,
anya-e1206n0:118_3: tvamasikatādhi kāro mahāsattadhuraṇdharo, etādisaṃ puññāyatanaṭṭhānaṃ laddhā dhammena
anya-e1206n0:118_4: samena lokaṃ paripālento sugatasāsanaṃ paggaṇhanto dānapāramikoṭippattaṃ katvā pacchā
anya-e1206n0:119_0: 41. Atha so mahajjhāsayo purisavaro mahāsaṅghassa anusāsaniṃ madditu masamaṇtho adhivāsesī.
anya-e1206n0:119_1: Anantarañca mahājanakāyo saṅghassa anuññāya sakalaṃ sīladīpaṃ ekacchattaṃ katvā abhisiñciya
anya-e1206n0:119_2: dhammika sirisaṅghabodhirājāti vohāraṃ paṭṭhapesi goṭhābhayañca senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e1206n0:131_0: 44. So rājā mahā vihāre mahaggha mahāvisālaṃ salākaggaṃ kārāpetvā anekasahassānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:131_1: bhikkhūnaṃ niccaṃ salāka bhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Mātulamahātherassaṃca sakanāma dheyyena
anya-e1206n0:131_2: mahantaṃ pariveṇa vihāraṃ kārāpetvā anekehi kappiyabhaṇḍehi saddhiṃ saparivāra veṇā
anya-e1206n0:131_3: kāni gāmakkhettāni saṅasaparibhogārahāni katvā dāpesi sattameva nisīthakāle rahogato
anya-e1206n0:131_4: mahābodhisattassa dukkaracaritāni sallakkhento tādisāpadānaṃ attani sampādetumāsiṃsi. Tathā hi
anya-e1206n0:137: Evamamhākaṃ bodhisattassa viya bāhira vatthupariccāgamahussavo kadā me bhavissatiti ca,
anya-e1206n0:142: Dukkhaṃ na tassa hadayaṃ vata pīḷayittha.
anya-e1206n0:143: Evaṃ kirassa mahāsattassa maṃsa lohitādi ajjhattikavatthudānasamaye dukkhavedanā manaṃ na sambādhesi. Mamāpi īdisaṃ ajjhattika dānamahāmaṅgalaṃ kadā bhavissatīti ca.
anya-e1206n0:149: Evaṃ sīla rakkhanāpadānasiriṃ kadā viṇdāmīti ca,
anya-e1206n0:155: Evaṃ mayāpi acirasseva avassaṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ kātabbanti ca,
anya-e1206n0:161: Evaṃvidhā kalyānañāṇasampatti kadā me samijjhissatīti ca,
anya-e1206n0:165: Taṃ muddhatāya na bhave matiyā mahanyā,
anya-e1206n0:167: Evaṃ vidhāya vīriyapāramiyā kadā bhājanaṃ bhavissāmiti ca
anya-e1206n0:173: Evaṃ vidhāya khattipāramiyā attānaṃ kadā alaṃkarissāmiti ca
anya-e1206n0:179: Ahampi īdisena saccapāramitābalena sabbalokassa catu saccāva bodhana samattho kadā bhavissāmiti ca
anya-e1206n0:185: Evaṃ ma māpi adhiṭṭhāna pāramitāya pāripūrī kadā bhavissatīti ca
anya-e1206n0:191: Ahampi evaṃvidhāya mettāpāramitāya koṭippatto kadā bhavissāmīti ca.
anya-e1206n0:197: Evaṃ ahappi upakkhāpāramitāya kadā sabbasādhāraṇobhavissāmiti ca niccaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1206n0:199: 56. Evamanavajjadhammena rajjaṃ kārente tasmiṃ kadāci kenacipajānaṃ akusala vipākena-
anya-e1206n0:204_0: 57. So tesu tesu gāmapariyantesu nisīdati, ye ye manussā tamāgamma taṃ rattakkhamudikkhanti
anya-e1206n0:204_1: tesaṃ akkhini rattāni bhavanti. Taṃ khaṇeyeva rattakkhamārako nāma jararogo pātubhavitvā māreti.
anya-e1206n0:205_0: 58. So yakkho matamate nirāsaṅke khādati. Taṃ yakkhaṃ adasvāpi ye ye narā tenāturā
anya-e1206n0:205_1: te te passanti, tepi so rogo āvisati. Evaṃ na cironavayakkhabhayena rogena ca janapado viralajano jāto.
anya-e1206n0:206_0: 59. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvāmayi rajjaṃ kārente pajānaṃ īdisassa bhayassa uppajjana
anya-e1206n0:206_1: ananucchavikanti maññamāno tadaheva aṭṭhaṃga sīlaṃ svādiyitvā attanā niccaṃ karīyamānāni
anya-e1206n0:206_2: dasakusalakammāni anussaritvā ahaṃ dhammavijayi bhavissāmīti taṃrakkhasaṃ ādisvā
anya-e1206n0:206_3: na uṭṭhahissāmīti daḷhataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya vāsagabbhe sayi. Tassa tena ācāra dhammatejena
anya-e1206n0:206_4: rājānubhāvena ca so rakkhaso santatto uttasitvā khaṇampi ṭhātuṃ asahanto ākāsenā
anya-e1206n0:206_5: gantvā balavapaccusa samaye antogabbhaṃ pavisitumasakkonto bāhire ṭhatvā rañño attānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:206_6: dassesi. Raññā ca kositvanti puṭṭho āha. Rattakkho nāmāhaṃ rakkhaso durajanapadesmiṭhito,
anya-e1206n0:206_7: ahaṃ khaṇampi ṭhātuṃ asakkonto tavānubhāvena baddhoviyahutvā idhānīto? Bhāyāmi deva tava dassananti.”
anya-e1206n0:207_0: 60. Atha rājā sayanato vuṭṭhahitvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā oloketvā are! Jamma! Mma
anya-e1206n0:207_1: visayagate manusse kasmā? Khādayīti. Mahārāja tava visaye mayā māretvā ekopi khādito
anya-e1206n0:207_2: natthi, apitumatakalebaraṃ sonasigālādīnaṃ sādhāraṇa bhakkhabhūtaṃ khādāmi, na me
anya-e1206n0:207_3: koci aparādho atthi, atthi ce rājadaṇḍo mayi vidhīyatū’ti vatvā pavedhamāno niccalabhāvena
anya-e1206n0:207_4: ṭhātuṃ asakkonto bhayavegena jātalomahaṃso sānunayameva māha. “Devassa raṭṭhaṃthitaṃ
anya-e1206n0:207_5: dhanadhañña samiddhisampuṇṇaṃ devassa dhana vassena sampuṇṇamāno rathā manussā, idāni
anya-e1206n0:207_6: yācakāpi bahutarā na honti, aha mīdisaṃ raṭṭhaṃ patvāpi aladdhagocaro aparipuṇṇamanoratho
anya-e1206n0:207_7: jato pipāsitova hutvā dīna bhāvena jīvikaṃ kappemi, tathā īdisaṃ bhayaṃ pattomhi
anya-e1206n0:208_0: 61. Atha rājā tassa dīnavacanaṃ sutvā karuṇāya kampitahadayo “mā bhāyitvaṃ rakkhasa!
anya-e1206n0:208_1: Abhayaṃ te dammi icchitaṃ tevadā”ti āha. Evaṃ raññoca rakkhassaca aññamaññehi saddhiṃ
anya-e1206n0:208_2: sallapannānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā antogatā anucarā rājānaṃ parivāresuṃ, atha kathānukathāya
anya-e1206n0:208_3: rakkhaso “agato raññā saddhiṃ sallapatī”ti sutvā sabbe amaccā ca nāgarā ca senā ca
anya-e1206n0:208_4: sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇañca rāja bhavanañca pūretvā aruṇe uggacchante mahantaṃ kolāhalamakaṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:209_0: 62. Atha sorakkhaso sannipatitaṃcaturaṅgabalañca āyudha hatthaṃ aneka sahassayodhabalañca
anya-e1206n0:209_1: disvā ativiyabhīto ṭhātuñca rañño āṇattibalena gattuñca kimapi bhāṇituñca na sakkoti,
anya-e1206n0:209_2: rājā tadavatthaṃ taṃ disvā laddhābhayosi imacchitaṃ te kathehī’ti āha, dhammiko rājā
anya-e1206n0:209_3: na me kiñci bhayaṃ uppādessatiti ñatvā rājānameva māha “devo jānātiyeva sabbesaṃ
anya-e1206n0:209_4: sattānaṃ āharaṭṭhitikataṃ, tathāhi uddhalokavāsino deva sudhābhojanena pīṇitā jīvanti,
anya-e1206n0:209_5: adhe lokavāsine nāgā bhekabhojanena suhitā vasanti manussā khajjakādinānāvidhena
anya-e1206n0:209_6: āhārajātena pīṇitā jīvanti. Amhādisā yakkha rakkhasādayo pana maṃsalohi sassādato
anya-e1206n0:209_7: tussanti? Tesvaha maññataro chāte ca pipāsite ca tādisaṃ karuṇāparāyaṇaṃ mahāpurisaṃ
anya-e1206n0:210_0: 63. Tanutcamavoca “matakalebarāni khāditvā vasāmi“ti saccaṃ mahārāja! Matasarīraṃ
anya-e1206n0:210_1: sukkhapaṇṇaṃ viya nīrasaṃ kiṃ metāya dujjavikāya pasīda deva! Varaṃ me dehi nava
anya-e1206n0:210_2: visayethita manusso eko janapado gocaratthāya me dīyatu, tattha manussānaṃ anapagatuṇhavegaṃ
anya-e1206n0:210_3: jīvarudhirañca jīvamaṃ sañca khāditvā ciraṃ sukhena jīvituṃ sakkā’ti āha. Atha rājā
anya-e1206n0:210_4: arepāpima! Rakkhasa! Nāhaṃ pāṇavadhaṃ anujānissāmi cajetaṃ tava gāhavikāranti. “Tenahi
anya-e1206n0:210_5: dine dine ekaṃ manussabaliṃdehi”ti. Jīvabalimekampi na demīti vutte “sacca menaṃ
anya-e1206n0:210_6: maṃdisāna kappa rukkhāpi avakesino jāyantīti hā hatosmi kimahaṃ karomī”ti visāda
anya-e1206n0:211: 64. Atha tassa nariṇdassa karuṇābhūyasi tahiṃ jāyamānā manotassa viratyā vyākulaṃ akāsi. Atha rājā evaṃ pari vitakkesi.
anya-e1206n0:217_0: 66. Etassa rakkhassa paresaṃ dukkhamā pādayituṃ na kadāci sakkā, ahañca ajjhattika
anya-e1206n0:217_1: dānaṃ kadādassāmiti patthemi, tadidaṃ pattakakālaṃ jātaṃ, saka sarīrassa ahameva
anya-e1206n0:217_2: issaro, mama maṃsalohitena etaṃ santappayāmīti kata nicchayo amacce āmantetvā evamāha.
anya-e1206n0:222: Ato paraṃ kiṃ piya matthi mayhaṃ.
anya-e1206n0:223: Amaccā evamāhaṃsu ekassa rakkhassa atthāya sakala lokaṃ anāthikattu micchato koyaṃ dhamma maggo devassa atha rājā evamāha.
anya-e1206n0:229_0: 69. Apetha tumhe na me dānantarāyaṃ karothā’ti āha. Atha amaccā yadicāyaṃ nicchayo
anya-e1206n0:229_1: apariccajanīyo amhesu ekeka meva dine dine rakkhassa balikammāya hotūti āhaṃsu. Atha
anya-e1206n0:229_2: rājā “ahameva jīvanto evaṃ nānājānissāmi”ti sallakattaṃ sīghaṃ ettha ānehīti saṃvidhahi.
anya-e1206n0:229_3: Atha tattha samāgatā sabbe janā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tassa guṇe anurattā sokena kampamānā
anya-e1206n0:229_4: tahiṃ patiṭṭhitena paṭighena ati kuddhā visuṃ visuṃ evamāhaṃsu.
anya-e1206n0:230_0: 70. Eso rakkhaso sīsacchedamarahatiti keci, kāla megha sadisa metassa mahā sarīraṃ
anya-e1206n0:230_1: aneka satānaṃ sarānaṃ tuṇirabhāvaṃ netumarahatīti keci, anekesaṃ khepana satthānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:230_2: lakkhabhāvaṃ mupanetuṃ yuttamiti ca pare, asikadalikīlāya vajjhoyamiti aññño telacolena
anya-e1206n0:230_3: veṭhetvā mahatā pāvakena ujjāletvā dahitabboyamiti apare, idaṃ sabbaṃ rājānānu jānāti.
anya-e1206n0:230_4: Imaṃ asappurisaṃ jīvagāhaṃ gahetvā rajjūhi guḷapiṇḍaveṭhanaṃ veṭhetvā baṇdhanāgāre
anya-e1206n0:230_5: pakkhipi tabbanti aññe evamevaṃ tattha bahudhā kathentānaṃ kaṭukataraṃ vadhavidhānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:230_6: yakkho sutvā tasito militakkhamatadeho viya niccalova ṭhito, atha so rājā “ehi sakhe
anya-e1206n0:236: Vatvā “mama sarīrato dīyamānaṃ jīvamaṃsaṃ jīvarudhirañca mayi anuggahena sampaṭicchā’ti rakkhassa vatvā sallakattābhimukhaṃ dakkhiṇabāhuṃ pasāresi maṃsakattanāya.
anya-e1206n0:237_0: 72. Atha so yakkho ubho kaṇṇe pidhāya santaṃ pāpaṃ paṭihatamamaṃgalaṃ rañño sotthi
anya-e1206n0:237_1: bhavatu, kimidamāpatitaṃ mahatā me pāpa vipākena jīvatu micchato visabhojanamicca,
anya-e1206n0:237_2: ātapatilantassa dāvaggi parikkhepo viya ca yadi īdiso me saṃkappa mahārāje samujjo
anya-e1206n0:237_3: yeyya deva daṇḍo me sirasi addhā patatūti, lokapālāpi me sīsaṃ chiṇdanti nāha mevaṃ
anya-e1206n0:238_0: 73. Atha rājā tena hi yakkha! “Kiṃ te mayā kātabbantī’ti āha. Atha so rakkhaso mahājanānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:238_1: vadha vidhānena rañño ānāya ca bhīto santatto “deva! Nāha maññaṃ patthayāmi kintu
anya-e1206n0:238_2: itoppabhūti rājārahena bhojanena gāme gāme upahārabaliṃ laddhukāmomhi’ti āha atha
anya-e1206n0:238_3: rājā “evaṃ karontu raṭṭhavāsino”ti nagareva sakala raṭṭhe ca bheriṃ carāpetvā pānātipāta
anya-e1206n0:240: Atha kadāci vassādhikatānaṃ devatānaṃ pamādena avaggaho pāturahosi.
anya-e1206n0:256_0: 77. Evaṃ mahatā gimhavipphuraṇena nadītaḷākasobbhādīsu sikatākaddamāvasesaṃ sositesu
anya-e1206n0:256_1: kedāresu mata sassesu bahudhā eḷitabhūmibhāgesu salilabhāvena kilantesu migapakkhisu
anya-e1206n0:256_2: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rāja karuṇāya kampitahadayo aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ samādiyitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇamāgamma
anya-e1206n0:256_3: yāva devo sabbattha vittha tāhi saliladhārāhi sakala laṅkādīpaṃ pinento vassaṃ vassitvā
anya-e1206n0:256_4: mahatā udakappavāhena maṃ na plavayissati maramānopi tāva na uṭṭhahissāmīti daḷhataraṃ
anya-e1206n0:257: 78. Taṃkhaṇe tassa raññe dhammatejena cakitānaṃ guṇappabaṇdhena ca pasantānaṃ devanāgayakkhānaṃ ānubhāvena samantato vassavalāhakā uṭṭhahiṃsu tathā hi.
anya-e1206n0:282_0: 84. Evaṃvidhe vasse pavattesi rājā namaṃ mahogho uppilāpadhīti na uṭṭhāsiyeva atha
anya-e1206n0:282_1: amaccā cetiyaṅgaṇe jalaniggamapaṇāliyo thakeseṃ anto sampuṇṇavāripūro rājānaṃ uppilāpesi.
anya-e1206n0:282_2: Atha so uṭṭhāya cetiyassa mahussavā vidhāya rājabhavanameva gato.
anya-e1206n0:283_0: 85. Tato adaṇḍena asatthena rajjamanusāsato rañño accantamudramānasattaṃ viditvā
anya-e1206n0:283_1: unnaḷā keci manussā gāmavilopādikaṃ ācarantā corā ahesuṃ taṃ sutvā rājā te core jīvagāhaṃ
anya-e1206n0:283_2: gāhāpetvā baṇdhanāgāre khipitvā rahasi tesaṃ ratanahiraññādikaṃ datvā mā evaṃ karothāti
anya-e1206n0:283_3: ovaditvā palāpetvā rattiyaṃ āmakasusānato chavarūpe ānetvā corahiṃsaṃkārento viya
anya-e1206n0:283_4: agginā uttāpetvā nagarato bahi khipāpesi evaṃ corabhayadva apanetvā ekadā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1206n0:284_0: 86. Kimanena rajjavibhavena, indaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sakosaṃ saparajanaṃ sahorodhaṃ sāmaccaṃ
anya-e1206n0:284_1: sakhavāhanaṃ rajjaṃ kassaci dānarūpena datvā vanaṃ pavisitvā sīlaṃ samādāya kāyavivekaṃ
anya-e1206n0:284_2: cittavivekadva sampādetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhinikkhamane ratiṃ janesi. Tadā goṭhābhayopi
anya-e1206n0:284_3: evarūpaṃ pāpavitakkaṃ uppādesi. Esa rājā dhammiko sadācārakusalo patidivasaṃ vīdhīyamānehi
anya-e1206n0:284_5: Tatoyeva cirataraṃ jīvissati etassa accayena kadāhaṃ rajjaṃ labhissāmi rajjaṃ patvāpi
anya-e1206n0:284_6: vaḍataro āhaṃ yuvajanasevanīyaṃ visayasukhaṃ kathamanubhavissāmi sīghamimaṃ ito palāpetvā
anya-e1206n0:284_7: rajje patiṭhahissāmīti cintetvā bahuṃ sāradhanamādāya uttaradvārato nikkhamitvā pubbacore
anya-e1206n0:284_8: sannipātetvā balakāyaṃ gahetvā āgamma nagaradvāraṃ gaṇhi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rājā
anya-e1206n0:284_9: “rajjaṃ kassacidatvā abhinikkhamanaṃ karissāmiti katasanniṭṭhānassa mama ayaṃ kenaci
anya-e1206n0:284_10: devānubhāvena sannidhāpito maññe amaccā mayaṃ ananumatāpi purāyujjhitumāra bhanti
anya-e1206n0:284_11: evaṃ sati maṃ nissāya ubhayapakkhagatassa mahājanassa vipulaṃ dukkhaṃ “bhavissati
anya-e1206n0:284_12: kimanena rajjena phalaṃ rajjaṃ tasseva dinnaṃ hotu”ti vatvā kaṃci ajānāpetvā parissāvanamattaṃ
anya-e1206n0:284_13: gahetvā dullakkhiyamānaveso dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā malayadesaṃ gacchanto
anya-e1206n0:288_0: 88. Iti cintayanto kamena gantvā hatthavanagallaṃ nāma mahantaṃ araññāyantaṃ pāvisi,
anya-e1206n0:288_2: timbarujambirajambuvibhita kāmalaka bharīta katirīṭakasālasaralavakula punnāga nāgakandambakāsoka
anya-e1206n0:288_5: suḷabhamūlaphalasalila sukhopabhogaramaṇīya taṃ mahā kānnaṃ oloketvā idaṃ me tapovanaṃ
anya-e1206n0:288_6: bhavitumarahatiti katālayo kāyavivekacittavivekānaṃ lābhena ekaggamānaso mettāvihāramanuyujantovaññajīvikāya
anya-e1206n0:290_0: 89. Goṭhābhayopi rajjaṃ patvā katipāhaccayena “mama caṇḍatāya vīratto pajāvaggo manaṃ
anya-e1206n0:290_1: paviṭṭhaṃ saṅghabodhiṃ ānetvā rajjaṃ kāretuṃ kadāci ussahatī”ti saṃjātaparisaṅko
anya-e1206n0:290_2: taṃ mārāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhisaṇdhāya “saṅghabodhirañño yo sīsaṃ ānessati tassa sahassaṃ
anya-e1206n0:290_3: pāritosikadhananti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi. Tato malayadesasiko koci duggatapuriso
anya-e1206n0:290_4: attano kaccena puṭabhatta ādāya vana maggena gacchanto bhojana velāya soṇḍisamīpe
anya-e1206n0:290_5: nisinnaṃ saṅghabodhirājānaṃ disvā tassa ākappena pasannahadayo bhattena taṃ nimantesi
anya-e1206n0:290_6: rājā taṃ nasampaṭicchi. So purisonāhaṃ nihīna jātiyaṃ jāto na pāṇavadhaṃ jivikāya
anya-e1206n0:290_7: jīvanto kevaṭṭo vā luddako vā bhavāmi atha ko uttama vaṇṇehi paribhogārahe vaṃse
anya-e1206n0:290_8: sañjātomhi mama santakamidaṃ bhattaṃ bhottumarabhati kallyāṇa dhammikoti taṃ punappuna yāci. Atha rājā
anya-e1206n0:292: Chāyaya gehaṃ sādhāya seyyaṃ vatthaṃ tacenaca;
anya-e1206n0:295: Evaṃ sampanna bhogassa na taṇhā parasantake;
anya-e1206n0:296: Tava jaccādimuddissa garahā mama na vijjatīti.
anya-e1206n0:298_0: 92. Atha so puriso bhūmiyaṃ nipajjanamassamāno nibandhitva yāci. Tato tassa nibaṇdhanaṃ
anya-e1206n0:298_1: nivāretumasakkonto sagāravaṃ sopacāraṃ dīyamānaṃ bhattañca sakaparīssāvanaparīputapānīyañcā
anya-e1206n0:298_2: paribhuñjitvā hatthamukhadhovanena parisamatta bhatta kicco annohaṃ katupakāro kīdisamassa
anya-e1206n0:298_3: paccupakāraṃ karissāmiti cintayantova taṃ abhimukhīkariya “anurādhapure kā pavattī”ti
anya-e1206n0:298_4: pucchi, atha so puriso pubbarājānaṃ palāpetvā goṭhābhayo nāma rājā rajjepatiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e1206n0:298_5: siri saṅghabodhirañño yo sīsaṃ ādāya dasseti tasha sahassaṃ pāritosikadhananti nagare
anya-e1206n0:299_0: Tassa vacana samanantarameva tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhahadayo mama sahassārahasīsadānena idāni
anya-e1206n0:299_1: etassa paccupakāro kato bhavissati ajjhattikadānattā dānapāramitāva koṭippattā bhavissati idañca vatare-
anya-e1206n0:311_0: Cintetvā kataticchayo “bho purisa sobhaṃ pirī sirisaṅghabodhi rājānāma, mama sīsaṃ
anya-e1206n0:311_1: gahetvā gantvā rañño dassehī”ti āha. So taṃ sutvā “deva nāhamevaṃ vidhaṃ mahāpātaka
anya-e1206n0:312_0: 95. Atha rājā “mā bhāyi kahāpaṇasaggassalābhāya ahameva te upāsaṃ karissāmi kevalaṃ
anya-e1206n0:312_1: tvaṃ mayā vuttaniyāmeva paṭipajjā”ti vatvā sahassalābhagiddhena tena pathikapurisena
anya-e1206n0:312_2: adhivāsite sīsacchedāya satthaṃ alabhamāno dhammādhiṭṭhānateja sā sīsaṃ saṇdhito
anya-e1206n0:312_3: visuṃ karitvā dassāmīti cintetvā pallaṅkaṃ suṇthiraṃ baṇdhitvā mamedaṃ sīsadānaṃ
anya-e1206n0:312_4: sabbaññutañāṇa paṭilābhāya paccayo bhavatūti somanassapubbakaṃpatthanaṃ katvā taṃ
anya-e1206n0:312_5: purisaṃ attano samīpaṃ āmantesi. So adhikapuriso pubbe adiṭṭhāsutapubbadukkarakamma
anya-e1206n0:312_6: dinnaṃ sīsaṃ gahetvā anurādhapuraṃ gantvā dissemi kotaṃ sañjānāti kotaṃ saddahissatīti,
anya-e1206n0:312_7: atha so goṭhābhayo sace tena saddahissati ahavettha sakkhihutvā sahassaṃ dāpessāmi
anya-e1206n0:312_8: tayātu tattha evaṃ kattabba”nti paṭipajjitabbā karaṃ upadisitvā ehisappurisa mma
